<script type="text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {  
  //producto criteo 
      var email="";
      var email_id  = getCookieInfemailMD5("EMAIL_ID");
      email_id = email_id.toLowerCase();
      if(email_id!==""){
        email= email_id;
      }
      var hash = CryptoJS.MD5(email);
      
      
      var iditem  = $("#productSkuDisplayContainer").text().substring(4).trim();
      console.log('iditem', iditem);
      console.log('hash', hash);
      console.info('que es email', email);
      
      
      window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
      window.criteo_q.push(  
        { event: "setAccount", account: 21497 },
        { event: "setHashedEmail", email: hash },
        { event: "setSiteType", type: (/Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "m" : "d") },
        { event: "viewItem", item: iditem }
      );

     
  });

  function getCookieInfemailMD5(cname){
    var name = cname + "=";
      var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
      for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
          var c = ca[i];
          while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
          if (c.indexOf(name) === 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
      }
      return "";
  }

<script>  

  var skusPrueba = ['501600', '502781', '356041', '437313', '500086', '486998', '500087', '402570', '444578'];

  var skusFound = [];

  var referenceNode = document.querySelector(".product-basic-info");
  var newNode = document.createElement("div");
  
  if (document.URL.includes('/homecenter-co/product/')) { // PDP

      setTimeout(function() {
          skusFound = skusPrueba.filter(x => x === digitalData.ecom.sku);
          console.log('sku: ' + skusFound);

          if (skusFound.length) {
              loadScript_HP(digitalData.ecom.sku);
          }
      }, 1000);
  }

  function loadScript_HP(sku) {
    
      if (sku == '501600') {
          createNode('28K53LT');
      } 
      if (sku == '502601') {
          createNode('6DQ99LT');
      } 
      if (sku == '502781') {
          createNode('4PF33LA');
      }
      if (sku == '356041') {
          createNode('Z4B04A');
      } 
      if (sku == '437313') {
          createNode('Z6Z95A');
      } 
      if (sku == '500086') {
          createNode('3PX36LA');
      } 
      if (sku == '486998') {
          createNode('3PX47LA');
      } 
      if (sku == '500087') {
          createNode('4PF97LA');
      } 
      if (sku == '402570') {
          createNode('3UR27AA');
      } 
      if (sku == '444578') {
          createNode('6QV28LA');
      }

  }

    function createNode(node) {
        newNode.className = "ContainerIndexed";
        newNode.innerHTML = '<div id="contenidoIndexado">';
        var newScript = document.createElement("script");
        newScript.type = "text/javascript";
        newScript.src = "https://storage.googleapis.com/indexado/assets/alquimioIndexado.v2.js";
        newNode.appendChild(newScript);
        newScript.dataset.sku = node;
        console.log(newNode);
        referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode.nextSibling);
    }

    function showPopUp() {
        var div1 = document.createElement("div");
        div1.className = 'popup-express-pop';
        div1.style.display = 'block';
        div1.innerHTML = `<div class="content-express-pop">
            <div class="header-express-pop"><button id="closeBtn1" class="close" type="button"><span>\u0058</span></button>
                <img class="img-express" src="https://images.contentstack.io/v3/assets/blt2f8082df109cfbfb/blt99fb6b2c6afdb6cf/60abc16594bb755c04c28777/img-despacho-01.svg" alt="Icono Despacho Express">
                <div>
                    <h4 class="popup-title">Despacho Express</h4>
                    <p>Condiciones para tener en cuenta:</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="body-express-pop">
                <div class="condiciones-express">
                    <ul>
                        <li><span>1</span>
                            <p>Aplica s\u00F3lo para compras antes de las 4pm.</p>
                        </li>
                        <li><span>2</span>
                            <p>La opci\u00F3n aparece de acuerdo a la disponibilidad de inventario en nuestras tiendas habilitadas para \u0022Despacho Express\u0022.</p>
                        </li>
                        <li><span>3</span>
                            <p>Aplica para productos seleccionados y cantidades de compra que no superen 25kg de peso y su dimensi\u00F3n no sea mayor a 60cm.</p>
                        </li>
                        <li><span>4</span>
                            <p>Ten a la mano el correo de confirmaci\u00F3n de compra para recibir tu pedido.</li>
                        <li><span>5</span>
                            <p>Si no estas satisfecho con tu compra, puedes hacer cambio o devoluci\u00F3n de acuerdo a las
                                <a href="https://www.homecenter.com.co/homecenter-co/politica_de_devoluciones_y_reembolsos" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Pol\u00EDticas de devoluci\u00F3n y reembolsos.</a></p>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="footer-express-pop">
                <a id="closeBtn2" class="btn btn-primary">Entendido</a>
            </div>
        </div>`;

        var banner = document.getElementsByClassName('jsx-875689833 main')[0];
        insertAfter(div1, banner);

        var close1 = document.getElementById('closeBtn1');
        close1.addEventListener('click', closePopUp);
        var close2 = document.getElementById('closeBtn2');
        close2.addEventListener('click', closePopUp);
    }

    function closePopUp() {
        var popUp = document.getElementsByClassName('popup-express-pop')[0];
        popUp.style.display = 'none';
    }

    function insertAfter(newNode, referenceNode) {
        referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode.nextSibling);
    }

<script type="text/javascript">
  
  //producto criteo 
      var email="";
      var email_id  = getCookieInfemailMD5("EMAIL_ID");
    	email_id = email_id.toLowerCase();
      if(email_id!=""){
        email= email_id;
      }
      
      var hash = CryptoJS.MD5(email);
      
      var iditem  = digitalData.ecom.sku
      console.log('iditem', iditem);
      console.log('hash', hash);
      console.info('que es email', email);    
      
      window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
      window.criteo_q.push(  
        { event: "setAccount", account: 21497 },
        { event: "setHashedEmail", email: hash },
        { event: "setSiteType", type: (/Mobile|iP(hone|od|ad)|Android|BlackBerry|IEMobile/.test(navigator.userAgent) ? "m" : "d") },
        { event: "viewItem", item: iditem }
      );

  function getCookieInfemailMD5(cname){
    var name = cname + "=";
      var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
      for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
          var c = ca[i];
          while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
          if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
      }
      return "";
  }

			skusFound = skusVentanas.filter(x => x === digitalData.ecom.sku);
			
		    if (skusFound.length) {
		    	console.log('sku found: ' + digitalData.ecom.sku);
		        loadModal_ComoMedirTusVentanas(digitalData.ecom.sku);
		    }
		    
		}
		else {
			console.log('category no válida: ' + digitalData.ecom.catid);
		}
	
  }, 1000);

	function loadModal_ComoMedirTusVentanas(sku) {

		console.log('cargando div ventanas');
		
		var style = document.createElement('style');
		style.innerHTML = `.medir-ventanas {

		function showPopUp() {
		    div2.style.display = 'block';
		    step1.style.display = 'block';
		    document.getElementsByClassName("btn btn-primary")[0].addEventListener("click", showNextStep);
		    document.getElementsByClassName("btn btn-secundary")[0].addEventListener("click", showLastStep);
		    document.getElementById("closebtn").addEventListener("click", closeModal);
		}
		
		var step1 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-01")[0];
		var step2 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-02")[0];
		var step3 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-03")[0];
		var step4 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-04")[0];
		var step5 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-05")[0];
		var step6 = document.getElementsByClassName("paso-06")[0];
		
		function showNextStep() {
		    if (step1.style.display == 'block') {
		        step1.style.display = 'none';
		        step2.style.display = 'block';
		    } else if (step2.style.display == 'block') {
		        step2.style.display = 'none';
		        step3.style.display = 'block';
		    } else if (step3.style.display == 'block') {
		        step3.style.display = 'none';
		        step4.style.display = 'block';
		    } else if (step4.style.display == 'block') {
		        step4.style.display = 'none';
		        step5.style.display = 'block';
		    } else if (step5.style.display == 'block') {
		        step5.style.display = 'none';
		        step6.style.display = 'block';
		    } else if (step6.style.display == 'block') {
		        step6.style.display = 'none';
		        div2.style.display = 'none';
		    }
		
		}
		
		function showLastStep() {
		    if (step1.style.display == 'block') {
		        div2.style.display = 'none';
		        step1.style.display = 'none';
		    } else if (step2.style.display == 'block') {
		        step1.style.display = 'block';
		        step2.style.display = 'none';
		    } else if (step3.style.display == 'block') {
		        step2.style.display = 'block';
		        step3.style.display = 'none';
		    } else if (step4.style.display == 'block') {
		        step3.style.display = 'block';
		        step4.style.display = 'none';
		    } else if (step5.style.display == 'block') {
		        step4.style.display = 'block';
		        step5.style.display = 'none';
		    } else if (step6.style.display == 'block') {
		        step5.style.display = 'block';
		        step6.style.display = 'none';
		    }
		
		}
		
		function closeModal() {
		    div2.style.display = 'none';
		    step1.style.display = 'none';
		    step2.style.display = 'none';
		    step3.style.display = 'none';
		    step4.style.display = 'none';
		    step5.style.display = 'none';
		    step6.style.display = 'none';
		}
		
		function insertAfter(newNode, referenceNode) {
		    referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode.nextSibling);
		}
		
	}
  
</script><script>
  console.log('Incluido funciones cookies');
  //guardar cookie de la compra
	function modificarCookieSeguimiento(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
	    var d = new Date();
	    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
	    var expires = "expires = "+d.toGMTString(); 
	    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + " ; " + expires+"; path=/; domain=.homecenter.com.co";
	}
  
  function getCookieInfoFinal(cname){
		var name = cname + "=";
    	var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    	for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
        	var c = ca[i];
        	while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
        	if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    	}
    	return "";
	}
  
  function getCookieSeguimiento(cname){
      var name = cname + "=";
      var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
      for(var i=0; i<ca.length; i++) {
         var c = ca[i];
         while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1);
         if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
      }
      return "";
    } 
  
  /*obtener  sku de producto desde la url*/	
	function $_GET(param){
		/* Obtener la url completa */
		url = document.URL;
		/* Buscar a partir del signo de interrogación ? */
		url = String(url.match(/\?+.+/));
		/* limpiar la cadena quitándole el signo ? */
		url = url.replace("?", "");
		/* Crear un array con parametro=valor */
		url = url.split("&");
		/*
		Recorrer el array url
		obtener el valor y dividirlo en dos partes a través del signo =
		0 = parametro
		1 = valor
		Si el parámetro existe devolver su valor
		*/
		x = 0;
		while (x < url.length)
		{
			p = url[x].split("=");
			if (p[0] == param)
			{
				return decodeURIComponent(p[1]);
			}
		x++;
		}
	}

		console.log('sessionId = ', digitalData.page.sessionId);
		console.log('value = ', digitalData.ecom.TotalOrder);

		var versaProducts = "";
		var versaQuantity = "";

		for (var i = 0; i < digitalData.ecom.productList.length; i++) {
			versaProducts +=  digitalData.ecom.productList[i].sku + ",";
			versaQuantity += digitalData.ecom.productList[i].quantity + ",";
		}

		console.log('products = ', versaProducts);
		console.log('quantity = ', versaQuantity);

			"productinfo": "",

			//Custom parameters:

	versaTag.dynamicRetargetParams = {};
	// Third party tags conditional parameters and mapping rule parameters. Syntax: "CondParam1":"ParamValue1", "CondParam2":"ParamValue2". ParamValue can be empty.
	versaTag.conditionalParams = {};

				</div> ${newSection.innerHTML}`;
				insertAfter(newSection, referenceNode);
		}
	}
	
	var Wbtn = document.getElementById("testId-Link-support-link-Venta telefónica");
	if (Wbtn) {
		document.getElementById("testId-Link-support-link-Venta telefónica").addEventListener("click", marcarWhatsapp);
	}
	
	var WbtnM = document.getElementById("support-link-Dejanos tu opinion");
	if (WbtnM) {
		document.getElementById("support-link-Dejanos tu opinion").addEventListener("click", marcarWhatsapp);
	}
	
	var WbtnHome = document.getElementById('main-IconsAndInformation-cea9e510-6e90-4fd9-ba6e-aa145c2a883b-item-0');
	if (WbtnHome) {
		document.getElementById("main-IconsAndInformation-cea9e510-6e90-4fd9-ba6e-aa145c2a883b-item-0").addEventListener("click", marcarWhatsapp);
	}
    
    var enlace = document.getElementsByClassName('icon-lineas')[0]; //ATG
    if (enlace) {
      enlace.addEventListener("click", marcarWhatsapp);
    }

    var imagen = document.getElementsByClassName('contenido-new')[0].firstElementChild; //ATG
    if (imagen) {
      imagen.addEventListener("click", marcarWhatsapp);
    }

  }, 500);

  function insertAfter(newElement, referenceNode) {
      referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newElement, referenceNode.nextSibling);
  }

  function marcarWhatsapp() {
      var width = screen.width;
      var device = '';
      if (width > 767) {
          device = 'Desktop';
      } else { 
          device = 'Mobile';
      }
      var url = document.URL;
      gtag('event', device, { 'event_category': 'Click botón Whatsapp', 'event_label': url, 'value': ''});
  }

</script>

    var intervalosEncuesta = setInterval(function() {
        var uno = document.getElementById('acsMainInvite');

				ga(trackerName + '.send', 'event', { eventCategory:'Encuesta_Foresee', eventAction: 'click', eventLabel: 'Encuesta_Foresee_Desktop_Cerrar'});
			});

				ga(trackerName + '.send', 'event', { eventCategory:'Encuesta_Foresee', eventAction: 'click', eventLabel: 'Encuesta_Foresee_Desktop_Responder'});
			});

			//mobile cerrar
			cuatro.click(function() {
				if (innerWidth < 768) {
                    console.log('click en cerrar encuesta mobile');
                    ga(trackerName + '.send', 'event', { eventCategory:'Encuesta_Foresee', eventAction: 'click', eventLabel: 'Encuesta_Foresee_Mobile_Cerrar'});
                }

			});

		}
	}, 1000);

<!-- End of global snippet: Please do not remove --><script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    document.getElementById("logoutLink").onclick = function() {myFunction()};
    function myFunction() {
     eliminarCookie('EMAIL_ID', '', 365);
     console.info('cookie de email id vacia');
    }
  });
  function eliminarCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
	    var d = new Date();
	    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
	    var expires = "expires = "+d.toGMTString(); 
	    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + " ; " + expires+"; path=/; domain=.homecenter.com.co";
	}

  }

  //Cerrar Sticky QR
  function closeSticky() {
      var width = screen.width;
      if (width > 767) {
          var divS1 = document.getElementsByClassName('stycky-mudi')[0];
          divS1.style.display = 'none';
      }
      if (width < 768) {
          var divSM1 = document.getElementsByClassName('stycky-mudi')[0];
          divSM1.style.display = 'none';
      }
  }

  // iFrame manipulable
  function manipulateIframe() {
      var divf1 = document.createElement("div");
      divf1.className = 'div3D';
      var iframe1 = document.createElement("iframe");
      iframe1.className = 'iframe3D';
      iframe1.src = 'https://viewer.mudi.com.co/v1/web?id=' + id + '&sku=' + sku;
      var width = screen.width;
      
      divf1.appendChild(iframe1);
      divf1.style.display = 'none';

      var canva = document.getElementsByClassName('product-image-wrapper')[0];
      var canvaMobile = document.getElementsByClassName('product-image-mobile')[0];

      var labelB1 = document.getElementsByClassName('ra-3d-mudi')[0];
      var picture = document.getElementsByClassName('product-image')[0];
      var pictureM = document.getElementById('s7viewer');
      var d3d = document.getElementsByClassName('div3D')[0];
              
      if (width > 767) {
          if (canva.style.display != 'none') {
              insertBefore(canva, divf1);
              canva.style.display = 'none';
              divf1.style.display = 'flex';
              labelB1.style.padding = '10px 0px 0px 20px';
              divf1.appendChild(labelB1);
              marcarAnalytics('3D');
          } else {
              canva.style.display = 'flex';
              //d3d.style.display = 'none';
              d3d.remove();
              picture.appendChild(labelB1);
              labelB1.style.padding = '0px';
          }
      } else {

          if (canvaMobile.style.display != 'none') {
              insertBefore(canvaMobile, divf1);
              canvaMobile.style.display = 'none';
              divf1.style.display = 'flex';
              divf1.appendChild(labelB1);
              marcarAnalytics('3D');
          } else {
              canvaMobile.style.display = 'block';
              //divf1.style.display = 'none';
              d3d.remove();
              pictureM.appendChild(labelB1);
          }
      }
  }

  function insertAfter(referenceNode, newNode) {
      referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode.nextSibling);
  }

  function insertBefore(referenceNode, newNode) {
      referenceNode.parentNode.insertBefore(newNode, referenceNode);
  }

  //Detectar sistema operativo
  function detectOS() {
      var platform = navigator.platform.toLowerCase(),
          iosPlatforms = ['iphone', 'ipad', 'ipod', 'ipod touch'];

      if (platform.includes('mac')) return ('MacOS');
      if (iosPlatforms.includes(platform)) return ('iOS');
      if (platform.includes('win')) return ('Windows');
      if (/android/.test(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())) return ('Android');
      if (/linux/.test(platform)) return ('Linux');
  }

  (function() {

      var isRelAR = false;

      var a = document.createElement('a');

      if (a.relList.supports('ar')) {

          isRelAR = true;

      }

      document.documentElement.classList.add(isRelAR ? 'relar' : 'no-relar');

  })();

  function marcarAnalytics(selectedButton) {
    var selctdButton = 'click botón ' + selectedButton + ' Mudi';
    product = digitalData.ecom.sku;
    var width = screen.width;
    var device = '';
    if (width > 767) {
        device = 'Desktop_Mudi';
    } else { 
        device = 'Mobile_Mudi';
    }
    var url = document.URL;
    gtag('event', selctdButton, { 'event_category': device, 'event_label': product, 'value': ''});
    console.log('evento marcado');
  }

  function eliminarCookie(cname, cvalue, exdays) {
	    var d = new Date();
	    d.setTime(d.getTime() + (exdays*24*60*60*1000));
	    var expires = "expires = "+d.toGMTString(); 
	    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + " ; " + expires+"; path=/; domain=.homecenter.com.co";
	}
